Amazing!The ambiance and decor is very charming.I am Italian and I was extremely  pleased with every one of my orders. We had the burrata as an appetizer followed by Paccheri ripieni and gnocchi.We ended the meal with a glass of vin santo.We plan to come back to try the homemade fettuccine and the fritti!Buon appetito!PsHomemade pasta is only on Sundays!
